participant_1.background:
I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
my favorite hobby is knitting.
I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car.
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.

participant_2.background:
I am not close to my family but I want to be.
i m a college student.
i am a free spirit.
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
I enjoy spending time with my family, but I also enjoy my freedom to travel and see the world.

content.text: Hi there! Hows your day going?
Good thanks! I'm just getting ready to go to class.
Oh cool. I'm headed to work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a chef at a local restaurant.
That sounds fun! I love to cook.
Me too! It's the best way to relax.
I agree! I'm not very close to my family, but I love to travel and see the world.
That's cool! I love to travel too. I'm actually Filipino, and I love to travel to the Philippines to visit my family.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to travel to the Philippines.
You should! It's a beautiful country.
I have to go now, but it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
